mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.title, a.introduce, a.article_type, a.language, a.technologyType, a.md_text_id, a.create_time, a.create_by, (SELECT name from user where id = a.create_by limit 1) as 'createByName' FROM article a inner JOIN question_answer b ON b.question_id = #{questionId} and a.id = b.article_id and a.status = #{status} AND a.del_flag = #{delFlag} order by a.id desc limit #{start},#{number}
mapper.insert: insert into article value( null, #{article.title}, #{article.introduce}, #{articleList}, #{languageList}, #{article.technologyType}, #{article.id}, #{article.createTime}, #{article.createBy}, null, 1, #{article.privacy}, 0, 0 )
